translations: n.烟火（firework 的复数形式）；激烈争论

phrs.translation: 烟花汇演，烟火表演；施放烟火

sentences.sentence: Two of the fireworks in the box were duds.
sentences.translation: 盒子里的烟火有两个是点不着的废品。

sentences.sentence: The night skies will be aglow with fireworks.
The sky was full of brightly coloured fireworks.
sentences.translation: 满天一片色彩绚丽的烟火。
